author.bio: Dr. Mohamed El Fadil is a visionary physician whose passion bridges the realms of human cognition and artificial intelligence. With over a decade of clinical experience and a deep fascination with the brain's complexity, he has dedicated his career to understanding how Original Intelligence (OI) can coexist, collaborate, and even converge with Artificial Intelligence (AI).
author.description: As the founder of BrainSAIT, Dr. Fadil leads a movement to transform healthcare through hyper-automation, ethical AI systems, and intelligent design. His work integrates medicine, neuroscience, and technology‚Äîempowering individuals and institutions to move from ideas to impact.

cards.title: A Journey Through Two Minds
cards.description: In "OI vs AI," Dr. Mohamed El Fadil takes readers on an extraordinary journey through the landscape of intelligence. From the biological foundations of human cognition to the algorithmic precision of artificial minds, discover what makes each type of intelligence unique and powerful.
